title: Buying a ruin page
body:
hey riot 

i cant seem to find where the ruin page buy is i really need one for this new champ im playing please help me out here :)

thanks 
your FriendDeath

replies.body: The rune pages are in the store, but hiding at the moment.  When you go to the rune section, switch Show Tier 3 to Show All on the left side.  This will make the pages re-appear at the top of the page.  Hope that helps!
Thank you that helped me but i found out i dont have enough ip lol
